            class AddressTypesController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3.

              def create
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                @address_type = AddressType.new(address_type_params)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                authorize @address_type
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  if @address_type.save
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to @address_type, notice: 'Address type was successfully created.' }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  else
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31.

              def update

      39.

                  if @address_type.update(address_type_params)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

              def destroy
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                authorize @address_type
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @address_type.destroy
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  format.html { redirect_to address_types_url, notice: 'Address type was successfully destroyed.' }
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

              end

    55.

              def set_address_type
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                @address_type = AddressType.find(params[:id])
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end

                logger.info('!!!!!!! Handling Pundit::NotAuthorizedError in ApplicationController')

    55. 
            
              4

              def available_contests
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @active_contests = ContestInstance.active_and_open
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                                                  .for_class_level(@profile.class_level_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                                                  .with_public_visibility
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                                                  .available_for_profile(@profile)
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                                                  .includes(contest_description: { container: :visibility })
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                                                  .order('contest_descriptions.name ASC')
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                                                  .distinct
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                # Apply filtering if container_id is provided
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                if @container_id.present?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17.

      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if @department_id.present?
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22.

      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # Update @active_contests_by_container after filtering

              def show
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @contest_instance_entries = @contest_instance.entries.active.includes(profile: :user)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                # @contest_instance_entries = @contest_instance.entries
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                if params[:sort_column].present? && params[:sort_direction].present?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  sortable_columns = Entry.sortable_columns
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  sort_column = params[:sort_column]
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

    22.

    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24.

      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    when 'profile_display_name'
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27.

      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

    29.

      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                    @contest_instance_entries = @contest_instance_entries.order("#{sort_sql} #{sort_direction}")
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32.

      33.

    71.

              def create

              # PATCH/PUT /entries/1 or /entries/1.json

              def update
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                authorize @entry
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  if @entry.update(entry_params)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to applicant_dashboard_path, notice: 'Entry was successfully updated.' }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                    format.json { render :show, status: :ok, location: @entry }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                    format.html { render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity }
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61.

      62.

                  end

    63. 
            

            

                end

              def not_found

                def handle_auth(kind)

                def sync_affiliations(user)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  # Ensure user is present
          
      66.

              3
            

            

                  return unless user.present?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  # Extract new affiliations from session
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
              9
            

            

                  new_affiliations = session[:raw_info_hash]['urn:oid:1.3.6.1.4.1.5923.1.1.1.1']&.map { |value| value.to_s.downcase } || []
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  # Rails.logger.info("@@@@@@ New Affiliations: #{new_affiliations}")
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                  # Safely retrieve current affiliations
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              5

      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                  # Rails.logger.info("@@@@@@ Current Affiliations: #{current_affiliations}")
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
              3
            

            

                  ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                    # Add new affiliations that are not already present
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
              3
            

            

                    (new_affiliations - current_affiliations).each do |affiliation_name|
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              4
            

            

                      user.affiliations.create!(name: affiliation_name)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                      # Rails.logger.info("Added affiliation: #{affiliation_name}")

      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    # Remove affiliations that are no longer present
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
              3
            

            

                    (current_affiliations - new_affiliations).each do |affiliation_name|
          
      85.

      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89.

      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                        Rails.logger.warn("Affiliation not found for removal: #{affiliation_name}")
          
      91.

      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                    end

                  end
          
      94.

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordInvalid => e

              def ensure_at_least_one_admin_remains

                if container.assignments.container_administrators.count <= 1

              after_create :assign_container_administrator

              private

    50. 
            
              1
            

            

              def assign_container_administrator
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            
              186
            

            

                return if creator.blank?  # Skip if creator is nil
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
              1
            

            

                container_admin_role = Role.find_by(kind: 'Collection Administrator')
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              1
            

            

                if container_admin_role.present?
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            
              1
            

            

                  assignment = assignments.create(user: creator, role: container_admin_role)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
              1
            

            

                  unless assignment.persisted?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    raise ActiveRecord::Rollback, 'Collection Administrator assignment failed to be created'
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  errors.add(:base, 'Collection Administrator role not found.')
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  raise ActiveRecord::Rollback
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              end
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            end
          
      65.

              class Scope < Scope
